section.title: Introduction
section.p: An authenticator is used to identify a client. It is supposed to setup the Identity object which is attached to the session.

section.title: The user authenticator

When a valid username/password combination is entered, the previous user is removed from the session Identity object and the current user is added.

section.title: The anonymous authenticator
section.p: The AnonymousAuthenticator authenticates the request against the credentials of the user called 'anonymous' (which you have to create, and assign the desired permissions).
